Text: With a guest cameo by Larry Storch as "Vin the Snitch"

Larry Storch, Forrest Tucker's former co-star from both "F-Troop" and the "The Ghost Busters" Saturday morning TV series was in this ??  I didn't even notice him -- it must have been an unbilled cameo.

Also in the guest cast is Danny Wells, who was then being seen as Charlie, the bartender on "The Jeffersons".
